historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 redesignated § 13 of D.C. Law 6-100 as § 11b of D.C. Law 6-100.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-314, see notes following § 8-802.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 8-105.02.

DC CODE § 8-812

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall submit to the Council statistics on the number of notices of infractions and violations issued for violation of regulations listed in § 8-802(a)(1), and the number of notices subsequently dismissed.
The statistics shall identify, by Metropolitan Police Department district, the number of notices issued and dismissed
Statistics shall be provided on a calendar-year basis and shall be transmitted to the Council by January 31st, with the first report due January 31, 2010.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)
